title: Ep. 517 - The One And Only Way To Defeat Cancel Culture
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, a bunch of liberal academics have signed a letter speaking out against cancel culture. Most everyone else on the Left is furious about the letter. But letters and respectful dialogue aren’t going to put a stop to the madness. There is a solution to cancel culture, but it’s not for the faint of heart. I’ll explain what it is. Also Five Headlines and our Daily Cancellation.
